alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Cobb; Douglas; Haralson; Paulding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 11:01AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Paulding, Haralson, southwestern Cobb, northern Carroll and northwestern Douglas Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1101 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Tallapoosa to Draketown to Dallas, and moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Douglasville, Dallas, Buchanan, Villa Rica, Powder Springs, Austell, Bremen, Temple, Hiram, Tallapoosa, Mount Zion, Waco, Brownsville, Draketown, Lake Val-Do-Mar, New Georgia and Mableton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
